hi guys I'm Laura Vitale on this episode

375 the second thing one do is do a

with my big standing mixer but you could
do this in a bowl with just a wooden
spoon in the spatula or just a whisk
whatever you fancy I'm going to put my
butter in here both kinds of sugar and
I'm just going to cream this together
add the eggs and the vanilla and then as

this a little bit not too much probably
could have done this in a bigger bowl
but hey I'm not worried about it I'm

to put those about two and a half inches
apart from each other because these are
going to spread out quite a bit as they
bake if you don't have a large ice cream
scoop just take a quarter cup like a
little measuring cup and then just do it
that way okay now these are going to go
into my preheated oven at 375 for about
15 minutes or so and then I'm gonna let
